overview: A group of unsuspecting college students explore a haunted house and get more than they bargained for when the frenzy of the paranormal world reveals itself in Legend of the Naked Ghost. Come, take the ultimate sensually scary journey into the unknown as three young couples embark on a 'ghost-hunting' field trip to the abandoned mansion of the late tinsel-town actress, Gail Evelyn.
title: Legend of the Naked Ghost
